name: auro-name
process: Key filter for this repo

name: duplicate
description: This Issue or Pull Request already exists
process:
When duplicate issue or pull request is discovered, please apply this label
and add a comment so that the repo admin can address.

name: not-reviewed
description: Issue has not been reviewed by Auro team members
process: Automated: auto-applied with new issue, manually removed by reviewer

name: good first issue
process: Apply label to issues deemed low complexity

name: help wanted
process: Apply label to issues where a team resource is not immediately available and community help is requested
description: Extra attention is needed, this user requires assistance to complete the work

name: released
process: Automated: applied once a pull request has been merged and released

name: Status: Work In Progress
process: Apply label when the issue is being actively worked on

name: Status: Review Needed
process: Applied by author to alert managers and developers that work is in progress
description: Work is completed, user is requesting feedback

name: Status: Complete
process: This label can be applied to communicate that work is done while not yet accepted
description: Owner has completed work and considers it ready to be merged

name: Status: Blocked
process: Apply label to issues or pull requests that blocked from progress
description: Progress on the issue is Blocked, immediate attention is required

name: Abandoned
process:
Apply label prior to contacting author one last time before closing issue
or pull request
description: The author of this issue or Pull Request is not responding

name: Type: Bug
process: Author applies label type when reporting issue

name: Type: Feature
process: Author applies label type when reporting issue

name: Type: Design
process: Author applies label type when reporting issue

name: Type: Content
process: Author applies label type when reporting issue

name: Type: Refactoring
process: Author applies label type when reporting issue
description: A code change that neither fixes a bug nor adds a feature

name: Type: Documentation
process: Author applies label type when reporting issue

name: Type: CI
process: Author applies label type when reporting issue
description: Changes to CI configuration files and scripts

name: Type: Perf
process: Author applies label type when reporting issue

name: Question
process: Apply this label when there is an open question being asked as part of the issue

name: Type: Dependencies
process: Author applies label type when reporting issue
description: Pull requests that update a dependency file

name: Type: UI Update
process: Author applies label type when reporting issue
